questions.question: Which is the tallest mountain in the world?
questions.explanation: Mount Everest is the tallest mountain in the world.

questions.question: Which is the smallest continent by area?
questions.explanation: Australia is the smallest continent in terms of area.

questions.question: Which country is known as the Land of the Rising Sun?
questions.explanation: Japan is called the Land of the Rising Sun because it is located in the easternmost part of Asia.

questions.question: What is the national bird of India?
questions.explanation: The Indian Peacock is the national bird of India.

questions.question: What is the national currency of India?
questions.explanation: The Indian Rupee is the official currency of India.

questions.question: Which is the largest desert in the world?
questions.explanation: The Sahara Desert in Africa is the largest desert in the world.

questions.question: Which country is famous for the Eiffel Tower?
questions.explanation: The Eiffel Tower is a famous landmark located in Paris, France.

questions.question: What is the capital of India?
questions.explanation: Delhi is the capital city of India.

questions.question: What is the main source of energy for life on Earth?
questions.explanation: The Sun is the primary source of energy for life on Earth.

questions.question: Which is the largest country in the world by area?
questions.explanation: Russia is the largest country by area.
